author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tiffany Reports Q1 EPS $1.14
text:
May 23 (Reuters) - Tiffany & Co:
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.14 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.83 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY COMPARABLE SALES INCREASED 10% * ON A CONSTANT-EXCHANGE-RATE BASIS, QTRLY WORLDWIDE NET SALES AND COMPARABLE SALES ROSE 11% AND 7%, RESPECTIVELY
* NEW SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM EXPIRES ON JANUARY 31, 2022 * SEES NET CASH PROVIDED BY OPERATING ACTIVITIES OF ABOUT $700 MILLION FOR 2018
* SEES FREE CASH FLOW OF AT LEAST $400 MILLION FOR 2018 * SEES NET EARNINGS INCREASING TO A RANGE OF $4.50 - $4.70 PER DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE FOR 2018
* SEES FISCAL 2018 WORLDWIDE NET SALES INCREASING BY HIGH-SINGLE-DIGIT PERCENT OVER PRIOR YEAR
* SEES MID-TO-HIGH-SINGLE-DIGIT COMPARABLE SALES GROWTH FOR 2018
* NET INVENTORIES AT APRIL 30, 2018 WERE 5% ABOVE PRIOR YEAR, WITH 2% OF THE INCREASE RESULTING FROM CURRENCY TRANSLATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
